          <title>
            <string language="en">Micro-organisms  advantages, disadvantages, spreading and immunity</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mikroorganismusvorteile, -nachteile, -verbreiten 
und -immunität</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Avantages, inconvénients, propagation et immunité
de micro-organismes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Vantagens, desvantagens, espalhar e immunity dos 
micro-organisms</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Vantaggi, svantaggi, diffusione ed immunità dei 
microorganismi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πλεονεκτήματα, μειονεκτήματα, διάδοση και ασυλία 
μικροοργανισμών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ventajas, desventajas, el separarse e inmunidad de
los microorganismos</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the positive and negative effects of micro-organisms, how they get transported to the body, and how they can be stopped.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">bacteria</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Disease</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">fungi</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">immunity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">infection</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">micro-organisms</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">spreading</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">vaccination</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">virus</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die positiven und negativen
Effekte der Mikroorganismen, wie sie zum Körper transportiert 
erhalten und wie sie gestoppt werden können.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre les effets positifs et 
négatifs des micro-organismes, comment ils obtiennent transportés au
corps, et comment ils peuvent être arrêtés.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra os efeitos positivos e 
negativos dos micro-organisms, como começam transportados ao corpo, e
como podem ser parados.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra gli effetti positivi 
e negativi dei microorganismi, come ottengono trasportati al corpo e 
come possono essere interrotti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει θετικά και αρνητικά 
αποτελέσματα των μικροοργανισμών, πώς παίρνουν μεταφερμένοι στο 
σώμα, και πώς τους μπορούν να σταματήσουν.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra los efectos positivos y 
negativos de microorganismos, cómo consiguen transportados al cuerpo,
y cómo pueden ser parados.</string>
          </description>
